title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 2.29 - Other highly communicable diseases
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 2.29 - Other highly communicable diseases

State Regulations

Whenever a case of a highly communicable disease (as defined in section
2.1
of this Part) comes to the attention of the city, county or district health officer he shall isolate such patients as in his judgment he deems necessary. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
2.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
